channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Railroad BNSF stresses safety but is still held back by longstanding industry issues, report finds
item.description: Freight railroad BNSF is generally striving to improve safety on a consistent basis but that message doesn’t always reach front-line workers who often don’t feel comfortable reporting safety concerns for fear of being disciplined.

item.title: Residents in Boston suburb raised $20K after town officials shut down boy’s ice cream stand
item.description: A Massachusetts boy whose ice cream stand was shut down has become a minor celebrity after several businesses took up his campaign to raise money for charity.

item.title: Kamala Harris’ election would defy history. Just 1 sitting VP has been elected president since 1836
item.description: As Vice President Kamala Harris begins her fall campaign for the White House, she can look to history and hope for better luck than others who have tried the same.
